title: Elon Musk Says Tesla Share Buyback Could Depend on Severity of Any Recession
description: The entrepreneur and CEO said in October the car maker could buy back $5 billion to $10 billion in shares.

title: YouTube Paying Roughly $2 Billion a Year for NFL Sunday Ticket
description: The deal cements YouTube as a rising force in streaming online and on television sets.

title: Goldman Banking on Apple Partnership in Consumer Push
description: The Wall Street firm has pursued a deeper relationship with the iPhone maker while other big banks have resisted.

title: Eyeliner Out of Stock? Blame TikTok
description: From makeup to miniature waffle makers, items are going viral on TikTok and other social-media platforms, making the items nearly impossible to find.
